inclusion.criterion: Referred from an orthopedic surgeon with diagnosis of tibial lengthening or deformity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: unilateral or bilateral tibial distraction osteogenesis.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with Ilizarov due to neurological causes (e.g. poliomyelitis) or other
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: neuromusculoskeletal disease that could affect muscle function and innervations.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 14-year-old boy with scoliosis and back pain, candidate for scoliosis surgery.
